message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without an NDA, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so let me know your decision as soon as possible.
